title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

sample: 95 mol %(crystallization from solution;dried by vacuum heating)

ref.title: The influence of bromide-based ionic liquids on solubility of {LiBr (1) + water (2)} system. Experimental (solid + liquid) phase equilibrium data. Part 2
